info.title: Open API for Interoperable Traceability
info.description: Identifier and Credentials APIs for DID.

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

get.description: Get a DID's latest keys, services and capabilities

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

schema.description:
ErrInvalidDID is returned when the request path contains an invalid DID
parameter.

enum: Unauthorized: This endpoint requires an OAuth2 bearer token
Forbidden: OAuth2 bearer token does not have the required scope
Not Found: The requested resource could not be found

@context.description:
The JSON-LD Context defining all terms in the Credential. This array
SHOULD contain "https://w3id.org/traceability/v1".

type.description: The Type of the Credential

issuer.description: This value MUST match the assertionMethod used to create the Verifiable Credential.

issuanceDate.description: This value MUST be an XML Date Time String

options.title: Issue Credential Options
options.description: Options for issuing a verifiable credential

type.description: Linked Data Signature Suite or signal to use JWT.

created.description: Date the proof was created. This value MUST be an XML Date Time String.

type.description: The type of credential status.

@context.description:
The JSON-LD Context defining all terms in the Credential. This array
SHOULD contain "https://w3id.org/traceability/v1".

type.description: The Type of the Credential

issuer.description: This value MUST match the assertionMethod used to create the Verifiable Credential.

issuanceDate.description: This value MUST be an XML Date Time String

type.description: Linked Data Signature Suite used to produce proof.

verificationMethod.description: Verification Method used to verify proof.

proofPurpose.description: Credentials rely on assertionMethod proof purpose.

enum: Bad Request: Your request body does not conform to the required schema
Unauthorized: This endpoint requires an OAuth2 bearer token
Forbidden: OAuth2 bearer token does not have the required scope

schema.description:
ErrUnknownIssuer is returned when the implementation does not have private
key material for the requested `issuer`, and is therefore unable to issue
the requested credential.

enum: Unknown Issuer: Unable to issue credentials for specified issuer

post.description: Updates the status of an issued credential.

requestBody.description: Parameters for updating the status of the issued credential.

schema.description: Request for updating the status of an issued credential.

statusPurpose.description: The value of `statusPurpose` should match the `statusPurpose` property on the StatusList2021Credential referred to by the credential being updated.

status.description: In the case of revocation or suspension status lists, use a string value of "1" (one) to indicate "revoked"/"suspended", or "0" (zero) to indicate otherwise.

post.description: Create a presentation. This endpoint allows clients holding a valid OAuth2 access token (with the appropriate scopes) to create a presentation.

scopes.read:credentials: Grants permission to get Verifiable Credentials
scopes.update:credentials: Grants permission to update the status of Verifiable Credentials
scopes.prove:presentations: Grants permission to prove Verifiable Presentations
scopes.submit:presentations: Grants permission to submit Verifiable Presentations

limit.name: limit
limit.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)
